topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/steven-universe/post/558aeb1f63687228b700039f#post_558aeb1f63687228b700039f
[bq="EHAN"]Lemme just say

I'm used to hiatuses

Pretty much every show I get into eventually falls victim to scheduling nightmares, I'm starting to think it might be me that causes it somehow

It happened with Gravity Falls, then ponies started to catch it really bad lately, now Steven Universe. If you wanna get really technical then Nichijou on the anime side has this problem too, mostly with the manga because I think the anime's just about dead at this point.[/bq]
